response.text: What else would you like to know?
response.hint:
#### SQL Query

```sql
SELECT brand, country, SUM(net_revenue) AS total_sales FROM cpg.cpgnew GROUP BY brand, country;
```

citation.data:
#### SQL Query

```sql
SELECT brand, country, SUM(net_revenue) AS total_sales FROM cpg.cpgnew GROUP BY brand, country;
```
